name: Dear Red Hat... featuring Jeff Geerling (Changelog & Friends #7)
summary: Red Hatâ€™s decision to lock down RHEL sources behind a subscription paywall was met with much ire and opened opportunity for Oracle to get a smack in and SUSE to announce a fork with $10 million behind it. Few RHEL community members have been as publicly irate as Jeff Geerling, so we invited him on the show to discuss.
